networksession-only-api-request: Error message returned when attempting a non-api request from a NetworkSession
networksession-only-https: Error message returned when providing NetworkSession auth without using https.
networksession-invalid-config-ip-ranges: Error message returned when the NetworkSession configuration is invalid
networksession-invalid-config-token: Error message returned when the NetworkSession configuration is invalid
networksession-invalid-config-username: Error message returned when the NetworkSession configuration is invalid
networksession-invalid-config-multiple-m: Error message returned when configuration has specified multiple users that match the same request
networksession-no-token-match: Error message returned when the provided secret token does not match a configured user
